Remote IT Support - Programming - Coaching

About

Hello there! I'm Matthew, a highly skilled tech enthusiast with 20+ years of experience in providing exceptional Remote IT Support services. My mission is to empower businesses like yours with seamless tech solutions and boost your productivity.

With my Remote IT Support, you can say goodbye to tech challenges. Whether it's troubleshooting software issues, configuring networks, or optimizing Microsoft Office 365, I've got you covered.

Security is at the core of what I do. Rest assured, your business data and digital assets are protected through proactive measures, ensuring a safe and secure environment.

I'm also an AI implementation expert, creating smart chatbots and fine-tuning GPT models to enhance efficiency and customer experiences. Stay ahead with advanced AI-driven solutions.

Whether you're running a Linux or non-Linux setup, my expertise spans both environments, ensuring smooth IT support tailored to your specific needs.

With my 24/7 availability and fast response times, your business remains connected and efficient at all times.

IT Services - Pricing



Remote IT Support

With my Remote IT Support, I offer comprehensive assistance to troubleshoot software issues, configure networks, and optimize Microsoft Office 365. My fast response times and 24/7 availability ensure your business stays connected and efficient.

  • Troubleshooting
  • Software Assistance
  • Network Configuration
  • Data Backup Solutions
  • Cybersecurity Enhancements

Recommended Prices:

  • Remote IT Support: £50/hour
  • Block Booking (3+ hours): £50 - £250 (£50/hour)

Special Offer: Get a reduced hourly rate for Block Bookings of 3 hours or more. Ensure smooth operations with enhanced cybersecurity and IT support!

Programming Services

As an experienced Programming specialist, I can assist you in turning your ideas into reality with clean and efficient code. From web implementation to creating bots, scripts, and workflow automation, I'll help you build solutions that stand out.

  • Web Implementation
  • AI Chatbots Development
  • Script Creation
  • Web Workflow Automation

Recommended Prices:

  • Individual Project: £50/hour
  • Block Booking (3+ hours): £50 - £250 (£50/hour)

Special Offer: Get a reduced hourly rate for Block Bookings of 3 hours or more. Elevate your projects with AI and efficient workflow automation!

Coaching Services

I offer Coaching services to help you and your team maximize your tech potential. Whether it's mastering new technologies or enhancing programming skills, I'm here to guide you on your tech journey towards success.

  • Maximize Tech Potential
  • Enhance Programming Skills
  • Cybersecurity Training
  • Data Analysis Coaching

Recommended Prices:

  • Individual Coaching: £50/hour
  • Team Coaching: £40/hour (20% off)
  • Block Booking (3+ hours): £40 - £200 (£40/hour)

Special Offer: Get 20% off for Team Coaching and Block Bookings of 3 hours or more. Achieve tech excellence together!
